Detailed Description

An ID3v2 implementation.

This is a relatively complete and flexible framework for working with ID3v2 tags.

More information about ID3v2 tags can be found at

  • id3v2.2.0.txt
  • id3v2.3.0.txt
  • id3v2.4.0-structure.txt
  • id3v2.4.0-frames.txt
See also
ID3v2::Tag

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ Version

enum TagLib::ID3v2::Version

Used to specify which version of the ID3 standard to use when saving tags.
